description: A high-level orchestrator class for managing a multi-step menu image processing pipeline, including OCR, parsing, and image generation using external services. It exposes progress updates via ChangeNotifier and manages multiple stages and error handling.

classes.name: GenerationOrchestrator
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based class that orchestrates OCR, parsing, and AI-powered image generation for menu images, tracking progress and handling errors.

methods.name: startRun
methods.description: Performs OCR on the input image, parses dish names, generates images for each dish, and updates progress throughout the process.

methods.name: retryItem
methods.description: Retries image generation for a specific menu item within the current run.
